requestParams.name: account_type
requestParams.desc: 帐号类型(与帐户ID配合使用:1=客户(yzUid) 2=粉丝(原fansId),3:手机号,4:三方帐号(原open_user_id)

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['account_type']=1
params['account_id']="1140448191"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.crm.customer.growth.get', '1.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'1', 'account_id' => '1140448191', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
